row.name: UC4RB_DB_TAPE_UNLOAD#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_TAPE_UNLOADs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="tape unload" tooltip="These options are used only for TAPE devices. UNLOAD is the default when a session begins." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">tape unload</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_TAPE_UNLOADs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">These options are used only for TAPE devices. UNLOAD is the default when a session begins.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup>
